summary: This is an email chain from September 2020 regarding the request for a deposition transcript from December 4, 2009, in a case versus Epstein. It involves a court reporting service and appears to be administrative correspondence about obtaining transcript volumes.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Deposition
events.description: A deposition of Jeffrey Epstein was taken, generating a transcript in at least two volumes (Volume I and Volume II).

locations: 580 Village Boulevard, Suite 140, West Palm Beach, FL 33409
keyFacts: A deposition of Jeffrey Epstein was conducted on December 4, 2009.
The deposition transcript exists in at least two volumes: a morning session (Volume I) and an afternoon session (Volume II).
In September 2020, there was correspondence to obtain the morning version (Volume I) of this transcript.
The correspondence references Florida Supreme Court Administrative Order No. AOSC20-16 regarding remote proceedings due to COVID-19.
The document is associated with Prose Court Reporting & Legal Video Services based in West Palm Beach, Florida.
